meanings.definition: A man who behaves dishonorably, especially towards women.
meanings.sent1: The cad lied to the lady about his intentions.
meanings.sent2: She realized he was a cad when he cheated on her.
meanings.sent3: The cad tried to charm his way out of trouble, but failed.
meanings.sent4: His actions revealed him to be a cad of the worst kind.
meanings.sent5: The cad's deceitful smile gave away his true nature.

meanings.definition: A person who is unprincipled or lacking in integrity.
meanings.sent1: The cad stole money from his own family.
meanings.sent2: She knew he was a cad when he betrayed his friends.
meanings.sent3: The cad's lack of morals was evident in his actions.
meanings.sent4: He proved to be a cad when he broke his promise.
meanings.sent5: The cad's dishonesty left a trail of destruction behind him.
